subject: JUnit testing for ADF Components
msgSnippet: Hi all I have created test cases for normal HTML components in JDeveloper that too for static components. How can i do the same for ADF components. What are
messageBody:
Hi all


I have created test cases for normal HTML components in
JDeveloper that too for static components. How can i do the same for
ADF components.

What are all the ways to implement JUnit in a project?

can anyone please help me with this.
